abstract: This is the year of the comeback in the N.F.L., where teams have set a record for huge rallies.
snippet: This is the year of the comeback in the N.F.L., where teams have set a record for huge rallies.
lead_paragraph: Remember how the Saints poured it on against the Colts last Sunday? It turns out they had good reason to run up the score.

headline.main: On Any Given Sunday, a 20-Point Lead Might Not Be Enough
